title: [Medicine] Scientists developed a nasal or sublingual spray vaccine platform using nanofiber scaffolding technology. They say the nanofiber tech could lead to safer, more precise vaccines for infectious diseases, including Covid-19.

[Biology] Researchers found that patients with COVID-19 presented with abnormal liver tests at much higher rates than previously suggested. They also discovered that higher levels of liver enzymes were linked to poorer outcomes for these patients, including ICU admission, mechanical ventilation, and death.
